long_description: Perfect for wet environments, this waterproof glow stick from Life Gear is submersible up to 300 ft. and provides long-lasting LED light and emergency signals. Reusable, non-toxic glow stick helps you see and be seen while boating, fishing, diving, rafting, hiking or camping-rain or shine! It also makes for a great party decoration, bedtime reading light or sporting event accessory. Bright LED bulb provides up to 200 hrs. of battery life (on flasher mode). 4 different light modes: LED flashlight, glow mode, glow mode with LED flashlight, and flasher mode. Integrated whistle assists in emergency situations. 3 button cell batteries included.
short_description: Perfect for wet environments, this waterproof glow stick from Life Gear is submersible up to 300 ft. and provides long-lasting LED light and emergency signals.
